name: Overloaded!
description:
Upgrade your vehicles and travel around the world.

Just tap and hold to overload your bus with people!

Transport more passengers to earn more money.

New vehicles and cities are coming soon!

Super easy to play, hard to master!

Enjoy the best Idle Game!
publishers: Kar-Tek Yapi Endustri Sanayi Ve Ticaret Limited Sirketi
